description: There's nothing more comforting than a creamy potato bake. Take it to the next level with this cheesy bake loaded with bacon, brie and vintage cheddar.
name: Cheesy Potato Bake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange cheese over the top, then season. Bake for 30 minutes or until potato is tender and cheese is golden and has melted. Serve scattered with thyme.
